This is a C++ port of the "Fuzzy Engine for Java‚Äù by Prof. Edward Sazonov.
The original is available here:
http://people.clarkson.edu/~esazonov/FuzzyEngine.htm

Below you'll find an updated version. My port currently sticks to the original version
http://sourceforge.net/projects/fuzzyengine

Here's my port's webpage:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/libfuzzyengine
